page.title: 12A Gt.Bromley Saturday #1
page.content: On Saturday,I get up about 8:30 a.m.,I then watch{Breakfast T.V.}Breakfast is usually a cup of coffee,toast and {marmite}.Sometimes,I have cornflakes.I then get dressed.I usually wear jeans} and a T-Shirt , jumper,socks and Wellington -boots because my sister and I go horse riding on saturday morning for an hour.About 9:45,I put on my coat and riding hat and Mum or Dad drives us to the stable. I ride a pony called Cally. After we get home,I watch more T.V.or a video film,then I play with my toys. I like{Lego}or space ships &{Star Wars things best.At 1:00 we have lunch;either cheese and marmite sandwiches,or beans on toast then some cake.I drink milk or some fizz from the Soda Stream drinks maker Afterwards I go out on my{B.M.X.bike then take the dog for a walk with Dad.
